'Tea,

Some jerk ordered these and did a runner. Just throw them out when you're done.

She worked through the burgers methodically, chewing and swallowing determinedly against how painfully full she felt, barely stopping to breath until she had just a bite of the last burger left; having put away over twenty of them. I feel so full," Tea reached down to rub her bloated gut, her belly sticking out under her apron as if she was expecting to give birth at any moment, the material that usually fell so loosely over her flat stomach tight and rippled from the food she had quite literally packed away into it. She thought about just staying in bed for the rest of the day since she didn't feel like getting up but her appetite overruled that notion so she slowly got out of bed and brushed off some of the wrappers from last night's binge off her stomach, the dollops of condiments from them were smeared on her skin and uniform when she tossed and turned while she slept.

When she left her room, she noticed that her parents already left to run errands so Tea grabbed a full carton of milk, a loaf of sliced bread and enough ham to make sandwiches using the entire loaf out of the kitchen and waddled off to the bathroom to have a bath while she eats. She filled the tub with water and peeled off her clothes (promptly tossing the ruined tiny uniform in the garbage) and squeezed herself into the bathtub before grabbing her late breakfast to place on her stomach that jutted out of the water and started eating.

An hour and a half later, Tea was back in her room, her hair still wet from her bath and now wearing a red track suit her parents bought her a week ago as a hint to start losing weight, a hint obviously ignored as Tea's bottom half strained the track pants and her stomach was poking out, but not excessively like most of her older clothes.

"Oh hey, Tea. Glad you are here on your day off 'cause it's less work for me." said the coworker as he set the trays down in an open booth. "We have some more in the back that I'll bring out."

Tea thanked the man and sat down in the booth though leaning forward to grab anything was a bit of a hassle as the padding in her butt combined with her belly against the table made it a tight fit for her, but she carried on and helped herself to some free food, accompanied by her own giant orders to keep herself fed until closing time.

While her face and uniform were a mess when she started, there was so much grease and other gunk on her face that it was dripping down onto her top which was now going to be ruined beyond repair.

Not only that, but all of the times grease was smeared on her face from eating that she was breaking out in zits. But despite the physical changes, Tea mostly remained the same girl she always was minus her addiction to food, her lack of manners when she eats (aside from her messy eating habits, she also let out belches and farts more often and was indifferent about it) and her taste in clothing. Tea now preferred to wear clothing that was several sizes too small because while it was an uncomfortable choice, her pleasure when she could finally take them off (or burst out of them while eating) was amplified because of it.

It seemed only seconds later Tea opened her eyes to the darkness of a blindfold, another strip of material twisted tightly between her teeth to stop her from screaming for help. She tried to cry out on instinct, the sound muffled and incoherent to any potential heroes outside of the vicinity. It wasn't the first time she had found herself in such a situation, being the only close female friend of the King of Games meant she ended up being held hostage more often than she liked. She lowered her head, wriggling her fingers to try and work out just where she had been taken, dismayed on feeling nothing underneath her fingertips. He laughed at her obvious fear, reaching out to grip her chin between his fingers, grinning manically as he leant his face in close to hers. "No need to worry, no doubt your knight in shining armour is racing to save you as we speak. But to fill the time until he arrives... I've decided that we should play a little game."

He sprung away from her, giving Tea a chance to look at her surroundings fully, the swirling purple darkness that tinged the corners of the room showing the shadow magic Bakura was clearly using to restrain her. Shaking her head, unable to get any information of the shadows that shrouded the area, Tea returned her attention to the white haired maniac stood some feet in front of her, his long fingers gripping about the golden ring of his millennium item. "The way I see it," he stalked in front of her with long legs, his narrowed eyes never leaving her face, "Women only fear one thing, above all else. To men like the Pharaoh's brat, it seems a waste of time, but oh no~ To you it's very real indeed, isn't it?" Tea gazed at him, her brow knitted in confusion, though a chill had started to seep though her. As Bakura moved, she could see a game board etched out in bright lines of light over the floor, numbers and words written into every section. Following her gaze, Bakura stepped aside with a flourish to show her the extent of the board, sweeping into a mocking bow. "You're appalling at duel monsters, so I decided to be kind, and make things a little easier for you. This resembles one of those... 'board games' my host apparently likes so much," he muttered to himself under his breath about how it was typical, boring games for a boring person, "But with a twist I am sure that you will love. Each roll of the dice," he held up a hand, the two cubes held between his fingers, "Gets you to move along the board. In addition, you will gain the number of pounds the dice happen to roll on," he laughed loudly at Tea's audible gasp, "Oh yes... you women are proud of your figures, aren't you?"

Bakura looked Tea's slender figure up and down with a knowing glint in those dark eyes, smirking at the beads of sweat starting to form just under her hairline ".. ahh you get it now, don't you? But that would just take forever.. and what a shame it would be if the Pharaoh and his brat actually got here too soon for any fun to happen. Each square contains an instruction. You can chose to follow it and avoid the penalty.. or you can chose not too," his smirk turned darker, far more sinister, ".. and draw a card of chance. You will either be granted something good... or something bad." Tea shook her head, her teeth gritted, tears glistening against the blue of her eyes, refusing to partake in something so sick. Bakura raised his hand up, tossing the dice to roll them over the lit up board. "... you choose, or I do. Your choice. Now," he grinned slowly at her, Tea's heart sinking at the thought she had to play along until Yugi and the others came to rescue her, "Lets play."

For the first few moments, all Mai could see was darkness, but quickly, her vision returned to her. As soon as her peripheral vision had mostly returned, she took notice of her situation. She was in a dark room, and bound to a table by tight leather bindings.

'What the heck happened,' Mai asked mentally, 'All I remember was losing a duel, and...'

"Losing a Wager?"

As soon as Mai heard this voice, she searched for the source of the voice. She found it when she looked to her left, and saw a cloaked figure. She was obviously female (and if the strained fabric in the chest region of that cloak was anything to go by, had a massive set of breasts), but that was the only thing Mai could identify about her. Nothing else could be told, because her entire body was obscured.

"I can tell you have some questions," the cloaked figure said, her voice soothing, yet sultry, "And I shall answer. First off, I am Mistress, and I shall be the one who is overseeing this whole operation. You see, my dear, there is something about you that we find sickening. And as users of magic, we've taken it upon ourselves to correct the issue..."

"What are you talking about," Mai questioned, getting annoyed at the woman's mysterious nature, "There is nothing wrong with me!"

"Oh but there is, my dear," Mistress said, "And the only way we could fix it was to abduct you. That's why we had you face our messenger, and to ensure our victory, we set his deck up to perfectly counter yours."

The pieces clicked in the back of Mai's mind, as she remembered that her previous opponent was very shady, and arrogant. And no matter what she played, he always could counter it effortlessly. She was doomed to be in this situation from the start.

"And now that you are here," Mistress said, "We can begin to make you a beautiful creature. And allow me to introduce you to what shall do it." The woman went over to the corner of the room, and flipped a light switch. Finally Mai could see what was going on, and the first sight she was greeted by was a mirror on the ceiling, that showed that she was currently wearing a completely black outfit, looking to be made of latex.

"You like," Mistress asked, "That touch was one of my sisters. She figured you'd want at least some decency while this is going on. That suit will stretch with you."

'Stretch with me!?' Mai thought, 'What the hell is she talking about!?'

"Oh don't worry," Mistress answered, as if she was reading Mai's thoughts, "It will all become clear after this." Mai looked in front of her, and noticed a large machine, with a tank filled with what looked to be a white, cream-like substance. Mistress took a tube off of the side of the tank, and brought it over to Mai, before snapping her fingers.

In an instant, Mai's mouth involuntarily opened as wide as it could, and the tube was forced down her throat. As she felt like she was about to cough it up, Mistress snapped her finger again, and Mai felt as if her gag reflex was being countered. And with one last snap of Mistress' fingers, Mai's mouth shut as far as it could, and Mai was completely unable to move it. The tube was now snugly in her mouth, and there was nothing she could do about it.

As a last ditch effort, Mai started to struggle as hard as she could, but to no avail.

"Oh my, quite the fighter," Mistress said, her sultry tone now terrifying to Mai, "Well give it a few hours, and you'll be too big for that. Or rather, too big for anything..."

The last piece clicked in Mai's mind, but it was too late by then. Mistress flipped a switch on the side of the machine, and it whirred to life, and the creamy substance began to enter Mai. She couldn't even taste it, due to the tube ending midway through her throat, but it was warm, and as it dropped into her stomach, she felt a strange warmth, instead of a feeling of fullness.

She didn't know what was happening, but it scared her, and that prompted her to struggle more.

"My my," Mistress said, "You really are stubborn. But don't worry. After a few hours, you won't struggle. Or rather..." Mistress slapped Mai right on her belly. "You won't be able to struggle..." And without another word, Mistress left the room, leaving the strange substance to enter Mai's stomach. And within a few minutes, Mai started to see the results, and why she didn't feel any fuller.
